survey_name: Employee Mental Well-being and Support Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' mental well-being and their perception of available workplace mental health support programs.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience work-related stress?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure question is neutral and non-leading.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How often do you experience work-related stress?

questions.question_text: Which of the following workplace mental health resources are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selection allowed. Include 'None of the above' to capture lack of awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: Which of the following workplace mental health resources are you aware of? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Not applicable' option for respondents unaware of support programs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health support would you find valuable in the workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Use text area with character limit (500 max).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text. Optional question.
